text.section:
The Comptroller shall design the license form required for:
the motor fuel tax laws; and
the sales and use tax laws.

The Comptroller:
shall determine:
the design of tax stamps and certificates required for the alcoholic beverage tax and for the tobacco tax; and
the form of any other evidence of tax payment; and
may adopt any other method or device that the Comptroller considers necessary to:
prevent fraud or evasion of the alcoholic beverage tax; or
comply with any restrictions that the federal government imposes on alcoholic beverages during a war or an emergency.

The Comptroller:
shall provide tax stamps and certificates to indicate that the alcoholic beverage tax or tobacco tax has been paid; and
may adopt reasonable regulations to prevent abuse but ensure the adequate availability of tax stamps and certificates, including regulations that:
limit excessive disbursement of tax stamps and certificates; and
require proof of need for tax stamps and certificates.
